picked_headlines.summary: AI system for scalable cancer screening using EHR, improving detection and integration.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article highlights a practical application of AI in healthcare, showcasing its potential to revolutionize cancer screening through improved efficiency and integration with existing medical systems. It appeals to both technical audiences interested in AI applications and stakeholders in healthcare.

picked_headlines.summary: Novel diffusion model enhances wireless resource allocation, improving QoS and scalability.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article presents a significant advancement in engineering, focusing on enhancing wireless network resource allocation. It is relevant for technical audiences interested in network optimization and stakeholders in telecommunications.

digest:
- *A CPU-Centric Perspective on Agentic AI* analyzes CPU bottlenecks in AI, proposing optimizations for better performance. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.00739)
- *From Code Foundation Models to Agents and Applications* offers a practical guide on LLMs for code generation, bridging research with real-world applications. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.18538)
- *SpikingBrain* introduces brain-inspired models for efficient training, achieving speedups on non-NVIDIA platforms. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.05276)
- *An Interdisciplinary Review on Missing Data Imputation* links classical and modern techniques with practical applications. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.01196)
- *CodeFlowLM* enhances defect prediction using PLMs, showing improved adaptability and localization insights. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.00231)
- *SpeechJudge* improves speech synthesis alignment with human judgment, addressing gaps in existing metrics. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07931)
- *SelfAI* enhances AI research efficiency with LLMs, introducing novel evaluation metrics. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.00403)
- *EPLKG* enhances prompt learning efficiency using knowledge graphs, reducing training time and memory usage. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2304.10805)
- *SWE-SQL* introduces BIRD-CRITIC for SQL debugging, enhancing LLMs with new benchmarks and training methods. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.18951)
- *Statistical NLP for Clinical Trial Success Prediction* improves resource allocation in pharmaceutical R&D with a BioBERT model. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.00586)
